reviewText: Anything by Dr. Barnard is important and helpful. He is the best in nutrition and advocating a vegan diet and healthy lifestyle.Highly recommended. Also, check out his organization PCRM which does so much good.

reviewText: Let's face it, health care is no longer about health or care. In fact, people are useless to the medical profession if they are healthy or dead. If one desires getting off the medical merry-go-round of constant doctor visits along with bags full of toxic medications then pay heed to Dr. Neal Barnard. Through his tutelege I managed to go from spending 8k a year on medications and doctor visits WITH insurance to ZERO! The truth is at the end of our forks. I have thankfully said goodbye to over 100 pounds along with medications for diabetes, cholesterol, blood pressure, heart problems and neck spondylosis. The information to heal ones self IS out there. We just need to pay heed to it and apply it.
Title: N/A
